FrageText.de: In welche Richtung dürfen Sie bei grünem Licht der Ampel fahren?
FrageText.en: In what direction are you permitted to drive when the traffic light is green?
FrageText.hr: U kojem smjeru smijete voziti ako je na semaforu zeleno svjetlo?
FrageText.sl: V katere smeri lahko vozite pri zeleni luči na semaforju?
FrageText.tr: Lamba yeşil yandığında, hangi  istikamete gidebilirsiniz?

de.Text: Ich darf in alle Richtungen fahren
Ich darf nur nach links abbiegen
Ich darf nur geradeaus weiterfahren oder rechts abbiegen

en.Text: I am permitted to drive in all directions
I am only permitted to turn left
I am only permitted to continue driving straight ahead
I am only permitted to continue driving straight ahead or turn right

hr.Text: Smijem nastaviti voziti samo ravno ili skrenuti udesno

sl.Text: Vozim lahko samo naravnost ali zavijam v desno
